channel.title: [RuneSouce] UltimateScape 600+
channel.description:
[img]http://ultimatescape.net/forum/images/misc/vbulletin4_logo.png[/img][right][b]Useful Links[/b] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/home.png[/img][iurl=#] Visit our Forums[/iurl] [img]http://facebok.com/favicon.ico[/img][iurl=#] Like us on Facebook[/iurl] [img]http://twitter.com/favicon.ico[/img][iurl=#] Follow us on Twitter[/iurl] [img]http://youtube.com/favicon.ico[/img][iurl=#] Visit our Channel[/iurl] [/right] UltimateScape is a new server based off BFMV's Azure which was based off Blakeman8192's RuneSource. My goal is to create a realistic, stable, lag free server with a stable economy and a moderate XP rate that people can enjoy, and unlike other private servers gain a sense of achievement if 99 in a skill is achieved if or a lot of money is obtained. I have tried to make this server as realistic as possible by using a lot of the resources available on RuneWiki for the combat, minigames and many of the skills.
[b]Legend[/b] Red - Not started Orange - In progress Green - Complete
[b][size=4]Updates[/size][/b]
[QUOTE] # Performance fixes # 1 connection/ip # Clipped firemaking # Combat rewrite # 7 new bosses # Added Hand Cannon # Added Dragon 2h # Magic Short Bow special # Added Dark Bow # Added NPC drop system # Fixed inaccurate weapon speeds # Added Dragon Claws # Added Magic Longbow # Added Korasi's Sword # Fixed 'x-logging' # Added Vesta's Spear # Rewrote NPC death method # Portals and NPC now respawn at Pest Control # Rewrote the Login Server # Player count updates on website # You can now specifiy a NPC's face direction # Added Morrigans Javelin # Fixed NPC HP bar # Added Morrigan's Thorowing Axe # The Ring of Recoil now degrades # Added all spirit shields # Fixed a major memory leak # Rewrote scripting system to be more efficient # Rewrote Runecrafting # Combat max hits are now accurate # Perfected shopping # Added Guthan's effect # All item requirements # Pest Control Shop # Updated Clan Chat # Duel Arena # Dicing [/QUOTE]
[b]Legend[/b] Red - Not started Orange - In progress Green - Complete
[b][img]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img][/b] [b][size=4]Combat[/size][/b]
[ul][li]Excellent Melee[/li] [li]Excellent Magic[/li] [li]Excellent Ranged[/li] [li]Single/Multi combat[/li] [li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]Special Attacks[/url][/li] [li]Prayer [list] [li]Normal Prayer[/li] [li]Ancient Curses[/li] [li]Perfect draining[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Skulling[/li][/ul] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/UltimateWorld%20Server/Combat/Darkbow_1.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [b][size=4]Skills[/size][/b]
[ul][li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]Cooking[/url] [list] [li]Use Range/Fire[/li] [li]Accurate burn formula[/li] [li]Cook 5, 10, All and X[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Construction [list] [li]Not started[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Crafting [list] [li]Gem Crafting[/li] [li]Leather Crafting[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Farming [list] [li]Not started[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Firemaking [list] [li]Clipped[/li] [li]Ashes when fire burns on[/li] [li]All logs are lightable[/li] [li]Light logs from the ground[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Fishing [list] [li]All fish can be caught[/li] [li]Correct requirements[/li] [li]Correct animations[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Fletching [list] [li]All logs can be fletched[/li] [li]Bow stringing[/li] [li]Arrows[/li] [li]Darts[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Herblore [list] [li]Cleaning[/li] [li]Identifying[/li] [li]Potion making[/li] [/list][/li] [li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]Mining[/url] [list] [li]Emptying and refilling rocks[/li] [li]All ores can be mined[/li] [li]Prospecting[/li] [/list][/li] [li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]Runecrafting[/url] [list] [li]All runes can be crafted[/li] [li]Correct altar locations[/li] [li]Production Multiplier[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Slayer [list] [li]Request Assignment[/li] [li]Change Assignment[/li] [li]Slayer Shop[/li] [li]Slayer Rewards[/li] [li]Slayer Points[/li] [li]Enchanted Gem[/li] [/list][/li] [li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]Smithing[/url] [list] [li]All bars can be made via the interface[/li] [li]All equipment can be forged.[/li] [li]Correct requirements[/li] [/list][/li] [li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]Theiving[/url] [list] [li]Stalls[/li] [li]NPCs[/li] [li]Minigame[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Woodcutting [list] [li]Stumps[/li] [li]Correct hatchet animations[/li] [li]All trees are cuttable[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Summoning [list] [li]Not started[/li] [/list][/li][/ul] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/UltimateWorld%20Server/Skills/Cooking_Skill.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/UltimateWorld%20Server/Skills/Firemaking_Skill.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/UltimateWorld%20Server/Skills/Fishing_Skill.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/UltimateWorld%20Server/Skills/Runecrafting_Skill.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/UltimateWorld%20Server/Skills/Smithing_Skill_1.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/UltimateWorld%20Server/Skills/Theiving_SKill.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/UltimateWorld%20Server/Skills/Slayer_Skill_1.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/fqb62.png[/img][b][size=14pt]Minigames[/size][/b]
[ul][li]Barrows[/li] [li]Fight Pits[/li] [li]Duel Arena[/li] [li]Castle Wars[/li] [li]Pest Control[/li] [li]Mage Arena[/li][/ul] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/UltimateWorld%20Server/Minigames/Barrows.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/UltimateWorld%20Server/Minigames/DuelArena_1.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/UltimateWorld%20Server/Minigames/DuelArena_2.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/UltimateWorld%20Server/Minigames/DuelArena_3.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/UltimateWorld%20Server/Minigames/FightPits_1.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/UltimateWorld%20Server/Minigames/PestControl_1.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/UltimateWorld%20Server/Minigames/PestControl_2.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/UltimateWorld%20Server/Minigames/PestControl_3.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/UltimateWorld%20Server/Minigames/MageArena.png[/img]
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20071125155039/runescape/images/c/cb/Miscellaneous_key.png[/img][size=14pt]Miscellaneous[/size]
[ul][li]Donation System[/li] [li]NPC Drops[/li] [li]Random Events[/li] [li]Multi-world support[/li] [li]Clipped following[/li] [li]Clan Chat[/li] [li]Dialogue's System[/li] [li]Punishment System[/li] [li]Accurate Item Prices (Dumped from Runewiki)[/li] [li]All equipment requirements and bonuses[/li][/ul] [SPOIL] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/UltimateWorld%20Server/Misc/QuestTab.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/UltimateWorld%20Server/Misc/ClanChat_1.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/UltimateWorld%20Server/Misc/CrossWorld.png[/img] [right]
[b]The Team[/b] Ultimate (Myself) : Lead Developer Xseil : Client Developer Xynth : Graphics Designer
[b]Special Thanks To[/b] BFMV[/USER] : Azure Blakeman8192 : RuneSource Graham : Hyperion Sigex : Client [/right] [size=18pt]Expected date of BETA: 26/06/2012[/size] [b]What to expect in the BETA[/b]
In the BETA gameplay with be significantly easier for the purpose of testing, the pickup command will be enabled so you can test out all the weapons and armor and also the and leveling will be super quick. [b]Stats/items gained in the BETA will not be carried onto the main game![/b]

item.title: [RuneSouce] UltimateScape 600+
item.dc:creator: @ultimatescape1 ultimatescape1
item.description:
@ultimatescape1 wrote:

[right]Useful Links
[iurl=#] Visit our Forums[/iurl]
[iurl=#] Like us on Facebook[/iurl]
[iurl=#] Follow us on Twitter[/iurl]
[iurl=#] Visit our Channel[/iurl]
[/right]
UltimateScape is a new server based off BFMV’s Azure which was based off Blakeman8192’s RuneSource. My goal is to create a realistic, stable, lag free server with a stable economy and a moderate XP rate that people can enjoy, and unlike other private servers gain a sense of achievement if 99 in a skill is achieved if or a lot of money is obtained. I have tried to make this server as realistic as possible by using a lot of the resources available on RuneWiki for the combat, minigames and many of the skills.

Legend
Red - Not started
Orange - In progress
Green - Complete

[size=4]Updates[/size]

Performance fixes

1 connection/ip

Clipped firemaking

Combat rewrite

7 new bosses

Added Hand Cannon

Added Dragon 2h

Magic Short Bow special

Added Dark Bow

Added NPC drop system

Fixed inaccurate weapon speeds

Added Dragon Claws

Added Magic Longbow

Added Korasi’s Sword

Fixed ‘x-logging’

Added Vesta’s Spear

Rewrote NPC death method

Portals and NPC now respawn at Pest Control

Rewrote the Login Server

Player count updates on website

You can now specifiy a NPC’s face direction

Added Morrigans Javelin

Fixed NPC HP bar

Added Morrigan’s Thorowing Axe

The Ring of Recoil now degrades

Added all spirit shields

Fixed a major memory leak

Rewrote scripting system to be more efficient

Rewrote Runecrafting

Combat max hits are now accurate

Perfected shopping

Added Guthan’s effect

All item requirements

Pest Control Shop

Updated Clan Chat

Duel Arena

Dicing

Legend
Red - Not started
Orange - In progress
Green - Complete

[size=4]Combat[/size]

[ul][li]Excellent Melee[/li]
[li]Excellent Magic[/li]
[li]Excellent Ranged[/li]

The Team

Xynth : Graphics Designer

BFMV[/USER] : Azure
Blakeman8192 : RuneSource
Graham : Hyperion
Sigex : Client
[/right]
[size=18pt]Expected date of BETA: 26/06/2012[/size]
What to expect in the BETA

In the BETA gameplay with be significantly easier for the purpose of testing, the pickup command will be enabled so you can test out all the weapons and armor and also the and leveling will be super quick. Stats/items gained in the BETA will not be carried onto the main game!

Read full topic
